name: Junior Number One
desc: When set this card in [Value Area], you can take a card with [Natural] Category from desk to your hand.
author: robzhou

name: Addition
desc: When this card is successfully setted in the [Operator Zone], select two cards in the [Value Zone] on the field and switch their order.
author: robzhou

name: It is an even number!
desc: When this card is placed in the Assertion Zone, you can discard one card in the [Even] category and then draw one card from the deck.
author: robzhou

name: Number Zero
desc: Once per turn. When setting a value or entering the discard pile, you can retrieve one [Assertion Card] from the deck and add it to your hand.
author: robzhou

name: Number Five
desc: When there are a total of 5 cards on the field (between you and your opponent), you can use this card to set value One more time.
author: robzhou

name: SIX
desc: When you have 6 cards in your hand, you can discard this card and then discard one card from your opponent's hand.
author: robzhou

name: Number Eight
desc: When using this card to set a value or discard, you can select an Assertion from the [Public Assertion Area] and move it to your or your opponent's [Private Assertion Area].
author: robzhou

name: Nine
desc: When this card is set, you can retrieve the one card which [Formula]'s value is 1 from the deck and add it to your hand.
author: robzhou

name: It is an Odd number!
desc: When this card is placed in the Assertion Zone, you can discard one card in the [Odd] category and then draw one card from the deck.
author: robzhou

name: Puzzle Assertion
desc: This card cannot be placed directly into the Assertion Area. It needs to be used by placing a value card facedown underneath it. During the final calculation, flipping over the value card underneath will be treated as asserting the value on that card. Afterward, the VP and DP of this card will be considered as half of that [Value] rounded down. If the value cannot be calculated normally and the assertion is invalid, then the DP of this card becomes 2.
author: robzhou

name: Multiples of three!
desc: Once this card is placed in the Assertion Area, you can choose up to three Operators Card on the field and swap their positions.
author: robzhou

name: [Legend]Mathematical induction
desc: Once per turn. When you place a value card in the Natural Number category, you can retrieve a [succeed] card of that value from the deck (e.g., placing a card with a value of 1 allows you to retrieve a card with a value of 2).
author: robzhou
